external_games.name: Trinity Town Monastery | Martial Art and Meditation
Trinity Town Monastery | Martial Art and Meditation

name: Trinity Town Monastery | Martial Art and Meditation
summary: You always wanted to train your martial arts skills in a perfect environment and practice with a virtual Bo or sword? Of course meditation belongs to the martial art. This brings strength for the ever new tasks you have to face every day. Transform your home into an incredible training arena and relaxing refuge.
